title: Does anyone else get this stutter bug?

embed.description: Discover & Share this Animated GIF with everyone you know. GIPHY is how you search, share, discover, and create GIFs.

body:
It's pretty annoying. It makes it really hard to dodge projectiles. Odd thing is it goes away after about 10 or so minutes. I've google it and nothing comes up.
It happened the last few patches as well, but would go away at the 2 minute mark exactly (insert pasta meme). I've fiddled with video settings, from low to high and nothing's changed.

Has anyone else run into this?

replies.body:
It definitely look like you're experiencing either *extreme bursts of packet buffering* or *packet loss*. These issues are caused by an issue between your PC and our servers, and should be resolved by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue.
I've had something similar when experiencing packet loss, are you getting any sort of ping spikes?
